quotes.text: Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration.

quotes.text: You can observe a lot just by watching.

quotes.text: A house divided against itself cannot stand.

quotes.text: Difficulties increase the nearer we get to the goal.

quotes.text: Fate is in your hands and no one elses

quotes.text: Be the chief but never the lord.

quotes.text: Nothing happens unless first we dream.

quotes.text: Well begun is half done.

quotes.text: Life is a learning experience, only if you learn.

quotes.text: Self-complacency is fatal to progress.
quotes.author: Margaret Sangster

quotes.text: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: What you give is what you get.

quotes.text: We can only learn to love by loving.

quotes.text: Life is change. Growth is optional. Choose wisely.

quotes.text: You'll see it when you believe it.

quotes.text: To lead people walk behind them.

quotes.text: Having nothing, nothing can he lose.

quotes.text: Trouble is only opportunity in work clothes.

quotes.text: A rolling stone gathers no moss.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.text: Ideas are the beginning points of all fortunes.

quotes.text: Doing nothing is better than being busy doing nothing.

quotes.text: Trust yourself. You know more than you think you do.

quotes.text: Study the past, if you would divine the future.

quotes.text: From error to error one discovers the entire truth.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.text: Well done is better than well said.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: Bite off more than you can chew, then chew it.
quotes.author: Ella Williams

quotes.text: Work out your own salvation. Do not depend on others.

quotes.text: One today is worth two tomorrows.

quotes.text: Once you choose hope, anythings possible.
quotes.author: Christopher Reeve

quotes.text: God always takes the simplest way.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: One fails forward toward success.

quotes.text: Learning is a treasure that will follow its owner everywhere

quotes.text: Be as you wish to seem.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.text: The world is always in movement.
quotes.author: V. Naipaul

quotes.text: Never mistake activity for achievement.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.text: What worries you masters you.
quotes.author: Haddon Robinson

quotes.text: One faces the future with ones past.

quotes.text: Goals are the fuel in the furnace of achievement.

quotes.text: Who sows virtue reaps honour.

quotes.text: Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: Talk doesn't cook rice.
quotes.author: Chinese proverb

quotes.text: He is able who thinks he is able.

quotes.text: A goal without a plan is just a wish.

quotes.text: To succeed, we must first believe that we can.

quotes.text: Learn from yesterday, live for today, hope for tomorrow.

quotes.text: A weed is no more than a flower in disguise.
quotes.author: James Lowell

quotes.text: Do, or do not. There is no try.
quotes.author: Yoda

quotes.text: All serious daring starts from within.

quotes.text: The best teacher is experience learned from failures.

quotes.text: Think how hard physics would be if particles could think.

quotes.text: Love is the flower you've got to let grow.

quotes.text: Don't wait. The time will never be just right.

quotes.text: Time is the wisest counsellor of all.
quotes.author: Pericles

quotes.text: You give before you get.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.text: Wisdom begins in wonder.

quotes.text: Without courage, wisdom bears no fruit.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.text: Change in all things is sweet.

quotes.text: What you fear is that which requires action to overcome.

quotes.text: When performance exceeds ambition, the overlap is called success.

quotes.text: When deeds speak, words are nothing.

quotes.text: Real magic in relationships means an absence of judgement of others.

quotes.text: I never think of the future. It comes soon enough.

quotes.text: Skill to do comes of doing.

quotes.text: Wisdom is the supreme part of happiness.

quotes.text: I believe that every person is born with talent.

quotes.text: Important principles may, and must, be inflexible.

quotes.text: The undertaking of a new action brings new strength.
quotes.author: Richard Evans

quotes.text: The years teach much which the days never know.

quotes.text: Our distrust is very expensive.

quotes.text: All know the way; few actually walk it.
quotes.author: Bodhidharma

quotes.text: Great talent finds happiness in execution.

quotes.text: Faith in oneself is the best and safest course.

quotes.text: Courage is going from failure to failure without losing enthusiasm.

quotes.text: The two most powerful warriors are patience and time.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.text: Anticipate the difficult by managing the easy.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.text: Those who are free of resentful thoughts surely find peace.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: A short saying often contains much wisdom.

quotes.text: Only do what your heart tells you.
quotes.author: Princess Diana

quotes.text: Life is movement-we breathe, we eat, we walk, we move!

quotes.text: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.

quotes.text: Argue for your limitations, and sure enough theyre yours.

quotes.text: Luck is what happens when preparation meets opportunity.

quotes.text: Victory belongs to the most persevering.

quotes.text: Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.

quotes.text: In order to win, you must expect to win.

quotes.text: A goal is a dream with a deadline.

quotes.text: You can do it if you believe you can!

quotes.text: Smile, breathe, and go slowly.

quotes.text: Nobody will believe in you unless you believe in yourself.

quotes.text: Do more than dream: work.

quotes.text: No man was ever wise by chance.

quotes.text: He that is giddy thinks the world turns round.

quotes.text: Don't ruin the present with the ruined past.

quotes.text: Do something wonderful, people may imitate it.

quotes.text: Do one thing every day that scares you.

quotes.text: If you cannot be silent be brilliant and thoughtful.

quotes.text: Who looks outside, dreams; who looks inside, awakes.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.text: What we think, we become.

quotes.text: The shortest answer is doing.

quotes.text: All our knowledge has its origins in our perceptions.

quotes.text: Trusting our intuition often saves us from disaster.

quotes.text: Truth is powerful and it prevails.

quotes.text: Light tomorrow with today!

quotes.text: The simplest things are often the truest.

quotes.text: No alibi will save you from accepting the responsibility.

quotes.text: Our intention creates our reality.

quotes.text: Silence is a true friend who never betrays.

quotes.text: From little acorns mighty oaks do grow.

quotes.text: You can't stop the waves, but you can learn to surf.

quotes.text: Speak low, if you speak love.

quotes.text: A really great talent finds its happiness in execution.

quotes.text: Reality leaves a lot to the imagination.

quotes.text: The greatest remedy for anger is delay.

quotes.text: Growth itself contains the germ of happiness.

quotes.text: Nothing strengthens authority so much as silence.

quotes.text: Wherever you go, go with all your heart.
